item.description:
WSHF was born out of the idea that the power of change lies within each of us.  Our overall mission is to promote general wellness through healthy lifestyle and fitness for clients of all ages and fitness backgrounds.  Our coaches strive to individualize each client’s fitness experience using various aspects and modalities (i.e. running, cross training, resistance training, yoga, pilates, etc.) to accommodate skill level, body-type, age, overall goals, etc.

Windswept Workouts:  Windswept Workouts is a local program designed to complement your regular fitness program.  During these 1 - 1.5 hour sessions, you will have a full body work-out with: thirty minutes of warming-up/cooling-down and stretching, thirty minutes of cardiovascular training, and thirty minutes of toning.  Locations, times and training sites will rotate and vary by area, demand and season but will be posted on our website.

MONDAYS

Lindstrom Field, Cambridge

(Granite St. & Rockingham St.)

6:00 AM and 6:00 PM

WEDNESDAYS

Simon Chiropractic, Brighton

697 Cambridge Street

6:00 AM and 6:00 PM

SATURDAYS

Simon Chiropractic, Brighton

697 Cambridge Street

10:30 AM

~~~

These are all 1-1.5 hour workouts!

All levels welcome!

Drop-In fee is only $10.00.

Please RSVP in advance to info@windsweptboston.com
item.name: Weekly Workouts - Brighton and Cambridge
